items.summary: Update the LoginPage component (frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx) to match the uploaded design mockup. Replace the existing layout with a centered card design featuring the Salad Khatora logo at the top, 'Admin Panel Login' heading, 'Secure authentication for administrative access' subtitle, and three feature sections with icons and descriptions: 'Secure Authentication' (Login with Internet Identity for maximum security), 'No Passwords' (Passwordless authentication using cryptographic keys), and 'Biometric Support' (Use fingerprint or face recognition on supported devices). Add the text 'By logging in, you agree to use this admin panel responsibly' at the bottom.

Maintain the existing Internet Identity authentication integration in the LoginPage component. Ensure that clicking the login button or area triggers the Internet Identity authentication flow using the useInternetIdentity hook, and successfully authenticated users are redirected to the admin dashboard.
